jsx.ui.html
Class Choice

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.Configurable
          jsx.Source
              jsx.ui.Widget
                  jsx.ui.Control
                      jsx.ui.ctrl.Clickable
                          jsx.ui.html.Input
                              jsx.ui.html.Choice
All Implemented Interfaces:
OnClick, OnRender
Direct Known Subclasses:
Checkbox, Radio
public abstract class Choice
extends Input
implements OnClick

An abstract base class for HTML elementary checkable input widgets.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

Field Detail

GROUP

public static final Id<Group> GROUP

A global identifier for a configurable property of a Choice widget.

The identified configurable property of a Choice widget is a reference to a Group object that defines the group that a choice widget belongs to.

Since:
1.0
Constructor Detail

Choice

protected Choice(java.lang.String html)

Typically constructs a choice widget.

Parameters:
html - The HTML text of the choice widget.
Since:
1.0

protected Choice(Group group,
                 java.lang.String html)

Typically constructs a choice widget in a group.

Parameters:
group - The group this choice joins.
html - The HTML text of the choice widget.
Since:
1.0
Method Detail

checked

public java.lang.Boolean checked()

Checks whether the choice is checked.

Returns:
The "checked" state of the underlying input element.
Since:
1.0

setChecked

public void setChecked(boolean checked)

Sets "checked" state of the choice.

This method synchronizes the group of choices.

Parameters:
checked - The new "checked" state for the underlying input element.
Since:
1.0

synchronize

public boolean synchronize()

Synchronizes the state of the choice.

This method checks the "checked" state of the underlying input element. It fires Check, Uncheck or Change event from the choice widget depending on the "checked" states.

Returns:
true if the "checked" state of the underlying input element has been changed; false, otherwise.
Since:
1.0

onEvent

public void onEvent(Click evt)

Performs an action on the dispatched event.

This method simply invokes synchronize() method.

Specified by:
onEvent in interface OnClick
Parameters:
evt - The event dispatched to this listener.
Since:
1.0
